Greetings, Thank you for taking interest in Virtugos, We have put in a lot of efforts in developing the software and we will continue to provide you the same, and lot more in future. \nThis is to note that the software is owned by Virtugos & , and anybody selling or redirecting you from any other sites to be considered scammers. We think that our customers must be satisfied and happy to deal with us, and save them from lending money in wrong hands.\n For Inquires, Customisation, Support & Installation, Please contact the below sites,
Greetings, Thank you for taking interest in Virtugos, We have put in a lot of efforts in developing the software and we will continue to provide you the same, and lot more in future.

This is to note that the software is owned by Virtugos and anybody selling or redirecting you from any other sites to be considered scammers. We think that our customers must be satisfied and happy to deal with us, and save them from lending money in wrong hands.
For Inquires, Customisation, Support & Installation, Please contact the below sites,
